name: AceTheInterview
0:
”Alexa, open ace the interview”
”Alexa, open ace the interview and give me a question”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ace the interview
des: The purpose of this skill is to provide a random set of interview questions for a candidate to practice. It can be very nerve-wracking to go into a job interview. You never know what someone is going to ask or what the interview culture is like. Users can say "Give me a question", "Question", "Next" or "Another" to have interview questions directed their way.
